channel.title: Interfaces help

item.title: Interfaces help
item.dc:creator: @adrijusxx adrijusxx
item.description:
@adrijusxx wrote:

Hello i have some questions about interfaces so the:
first one, do i can create interface without packing interface sprites in to cache?
why then i create interface like that:
public static void Donator(TextDrawingArea[] wid) {
RSInterface Interface = addScreenInterface(18797);
addSprite(18798, 0, “Donator/CUSTOM”);
addHoverButton(18799, “Donator/CUSTOM”, 1, 21, 21, “Close”, -1, 18800, 3);
addHoveredButton(18801, “Donator/CUSTOM”, 1, 21, 21, 18802);
setChildren(5, Interface);
setBounds(18798, 50, 50, 0, Interface);
setBounds(18799, 50, 60, 1, Interface);
setBounds(18800, 60, 70, 2, Interface);
setBounds(18801, 80, 90, 3, Interface);
setBounds(18802, 90, 100, 4, Interface);
}
my client almost load to login screen and it crashes like my sprites doesnt exist
sorry for bad english if you dont understand tell me ill try to explain or use translator

Read full topic
